text:
Ivo Niederle (26 December 1929 – 8 January 2021) was a Czech actor, entertainer, and commentator. He was born in Prague. He was known for his stage works at Municipal Theaters of Prague. His best known movie and television roles were in "Close to Heaven", "Žena za pultem", "Coach to Vienna".
Niederle died on 8 January 2021 in Prague, aged 91.
